thread.title: National Instruments Announces Upcoming Schedule of Events with the Financial Community

author: cnbc.com
title: National Instruments Announces Upcoming Schedule of Events with the Financial Community
text:
AUSTIN, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- National Instruments (Nasdaq: NATI) today announced participation in the following upcoming events with the financial community.
National Instruments Q1 2018 Earnings Call
April 26, 2018 at 4:00 p.m. CT
A live webcast will be available at http://investor.ni.com/events.cfm
NI Week Investor Conference
May 22, 2018
Austin, TX
Contact amanda.powell@ni.com to register
A live webcast will be available at http://investor.ni.com/events.cfm
For general investor-related information about National Instruments, please visit ni.com/nati .
About National Instruments
NI ( www.ni.com ) empowers engineers and scientists with a software-centric platform that incorporates modular hardware and an expansive ecosystem. This proven approach puts users firmly in control of defining what they need to accelerate their system design within test, measurement and control. NIâ€™s solution helps build high-performance systems that exceed requirements, quickly adapt to change and ultimately improve the world. (NATI-G)
